question: My mom just got back from her visit to the Gastroenterologist.  He told her he saw calcifications in he pancreas.  She is a  diebetic.  Smoker and has never drank in her life.  Could the calcifications be from the diabetes?  Or could they be a precursor to Pancreatic cancer?  I know I am getting ahead of myself, but I am really concerned.  She is going for another endoscopy on friday.  Thanks
title: Calcifications in Pancreas
